# Project Context

Learning repository for mid-level React certification. Currently contains JavaScript fundamentals exercises.

**Teaching Mode**: Be pedagogical and detailed in explanations to maximize learning outcomes.

## Tech Stack

- **Package Manager**: pnpm@10.28.2
- **Runtime**: Node.js v24.13.0 - runs typescript by stripping types out of the box
- **TypeScript**: Strict mode, ES2022 target, NodeNext modules

## Structure

- `1-Javascript/` — JS fundamentals (array methods, destructuring, spread/rest)
- `.vscode/launch.json` — F5 to run current file in integrated terminal

## Code Style

- Use modern ES6+ syntax (const/let, arrow functions, destructuring, spread/rest)
- Add inline comments to further explain code
